attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hi there,

i wish to propose the illiagalization of alcohol. you are all fast enough to come up with a reason to not legaliza cannabis,  which does not do as much damage as alcohol.

there is a esimated 2.8million addicted alcoholics in the U.K, that 2.8 million people get wasted, puking on streets, fighting, being nasty to door men.

more people die from alcohol than any other substance apart from nicotine, i want to know why you allow such a dangerous chemical that rots the liver and the body, a chemical that raises the strain on hospital staff,

how many people have died from ecstasy in the past year? 10 - 15 people? what about other drugs in the uk? what about alcohol?

alcohol ruined my child hood and alot of others to ban this substance before the next generation all become out of control drunks!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
